name: resource.customMetadata.recordLinkage
displayName: NFDI4Health Metadata Schema V3.3 â€“ UC 5.3 Record Linkage Block

name: resource.customMetadata.recordLinkage.legalBasis
displayName: Indication whether there are specific regulations/permissions for record linkage.

name: resource.customMetadata.recordLinkage.legalBasisDetails
dataverseAlias: Specific legal basis allowing record linkage
displayName: Information specifying which specific legal basis allows for record linkage.

name: resource.customMetadata.recordLinkage.informedConsent
displayName: Indication whether an informed consent that allows record linkage has been obtained.

name: resource.customMetadata.recordLinkage.responsibleInstitutions
displayName: Institutions and authorities that must agree to the record linkage.

name: resource.customMetadata.recordLinkage.additionalCosts
displayName: Indication whether there are additional costs for record linkage.

name: resource.customMetadata.recordLinkage.identifiers
displayName: Identifiers that can be used for record linkage (e.g. names, date of birth, zip code, insurance number or control number as in cancer registries).

name: resource.customMetadata.recordLinkage.furtherDetails
dataverseAlias: Further details important for conducting record linkage
displayName: Additional important details for conducting record linkage.

name: resource.customMetadata.recordLinkage.exampleResources
displayName: 'DOIs of additional related resources specific to record linkage (e.g., publications). Please do not repeat those already entered in the section ''Related resources''.'
